abstract: The LeMay Museum in Tacoma, Wash., is scheduled to reopen in June 2012 in a new, 165,000-square-foot space.
snippet: The LeMay Museum in Tacoma, Wash., is scheduled to reopen in June 2012 in a new, 165,000-square-foot space.
lead_paragraph: To hear David Madeira tell it, building a 165,000-square-foot, four-story museum to house the breadth of American automotive history is a solemn task and a mathematical quandary.

headline.main: America's Car Museum Takes Shape in Tacoma
